verses.verse: You, <S%H1121><s%> son of man, <S%H120><s%> prophesy <S%H5012><s%> against Gog, <S%H1463><s%> and say, <S%H559><s%> Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3069><s%> Behold, <S%H1463><s%> I am against you, Gog, prince <S%H7218><s%> of Rosh, <S%H7218><s%> Meshech, <S%H4902><s%> and Tubal: <S%H8422><s%>

and I will turn you around, <S%H7725><s%> and will lead you on, <S%H5927><s%> and will cause you to come up from the uttermost parts <S%H3411><s%> of the north; <S%H6828><s%> and I will bring <S%H935><s%> you on the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%>

and I will strike <S%H5221><s%> your bow <S%H7198><s%> out of your left <S%H8040><s%> hand, <S%H3027><s%> and will cause your arrows <S%H2671><s%> to fall <S%H5307><s%> out of your right <S%H3225><s%> hand. <S%H3027><s%>

You shall fall <S%H5307><s%> on the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> you, <S%H102><s%> and all your hordes, and the peoples <S%H5971><s%> who are with you: <S%H5414><s%> I will give you to the ravenous <S%H5861><s%> birds <S%H6833><s%> of every sort, <S%H3671><s%> and to the animals <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> to be devoured. <S%H402><s%>
You shall fall <S%H5307><s%> on the open <S%H6440><s%> field; <S%H7704><s%> for I have spoken <S%H1696><s%> it, <S%H5002><s%> says the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3069><s%>

I will send <S%H7971><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> on Magog, <S%H4031><s%> and on those who dwell <S%H3427><s%> securely <S%H983><s%> in the islands; <S%H339><s%> and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

My holy <S%H6944><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> will I make known <S%H3045><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel; <S%H3478><s%> neither will I allow my holy <S%H6944><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> to be profaned <S%H2490><s%> any more: <S%H1471><s%> and the nations shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the Holy One <S%H6918><s%> in Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Behold, <S%H935><s%> it comes, and it shall be done, <S%H1961><s%> says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh; <S%H3069><s%> this is the day <S%H3117><s%> about which I have spoken. <S%H1696><s%>

Those who dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall go forth, <S%H3318><s%> and shall make <S%H1197><s%> fires <S%H784><s%> of the weapons <S%H5402><s%> and burn <S%H5400><s%> them, <S%H4043><s%> both the shields and the bucklers, <S%H6793><s%> the bows <S%H7198><s%> and the arrows, <S%H2671><s%> and the war clubs, <S%H3027><s%> and the spears, <S%H7420><s%> and they shall make <S%H1197><s%> fires <S%H784><s%> of them seven <S%H7651><s%> years; <S%H8141><s%>

so that they shall take <S%H5375><s%> no wood <S%H6086><s%> out of the field, <S%H7704><s%> neither cut down <S%H2404><s%> any out of the forests; <S%H3293><s%> for they shall make <S%H1197><s%> fires <S%H784><s%> of the weapons; <S%H5402><s%> and they shall plunder <S%H7997><s%> those who plundered <S%H7997><s%> them, <S%H962><s%> and rob those who robbed <S%H962><s%> them, <S%H5002><s%> says the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3069><s%>

It shall happen in that day, <S%H3117><s%> that I will give <S%H5414><s%> to Gog <S%H1463><s%> a place <S%H4725><s%> for burial <S%H6913><s%> in Israel, <S%H3478><s%> the valley <S%H1516><s%> of those who pass through <S%H5674><s%> on the east <S%H6926><s%> of the sea; <S%H3220><s%> and it shall stop <S%H2629><s%> those who pass through: <S%H5674><s%> and there shall they bury <S%H6912><s%> Gog <S%H1463><s%> and all his multitude; <S%H1995><s%> and they shall call <S%H7121><s%> it The valley <S%H1516><s%> of Hamon Gog. <S%H1996><s%>
Seven <S%H7651><s%> months <S%H2320><s%> shall the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> be burying <S%H6912><s%> them, <S%H2891><s%> that they may cleanse the land. <S%H776><s%>

Yes, <S%H5971><s%> all the people of the land <S%H776><s%> shall bury <S%H6912><s%> them; <S%H8034><s%> and it shall be to them a renown in the day <S%H3117><s%> that I shall be glorified, <S%H3513><s%> says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3069><s%>

They shall set apart <S%H914><s%> men <S%H582><s%> of continual employment, <S%H8548><s%> who shall pass through <S%H5674><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> and, <S%H5674><s%> with those who pass through, those who bury <S%H6912><s%> those who remain <S%H3498><s%> on the surface <S%H6440><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> to cleanse <S%H2891><s%> it: <S%H7097><s%> after the end of seven <S%H7651><s%> months <S%H2320><s%> shall they search. <S%H2713><s%>

Those who pass through <S%H5674><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> shall pass through; <S%H5674><s%> and when any sees <S%H7200><s%> a man <S%H120><s%>'s bone, <S%H6106><s%> then shall he set up <S%H1129><s%> a sign <S%H6725><s%> by <S%H681><s%> it, <S%H6912><s%> until the undertakers have buried <S%H6912><s%> it in the valley <S%H1516><s%> of Hamon Gog. <S%H1996><s%>
Hamonah <S%H1997><s%> shall also be the name <S%H8034><s%> of a city. <S%H5892><s%> Thus shall they cleanse <S%H2891><s%> the land. <S%H776><s%>

You, <S%H1121><s%> son of man, <S%H120><s%> thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3069><s%> Speak <S%H559><s%> to the birds <S%H6833><s%> of every sort, <S%H3671><s%> and to every animal <S%H2416><s%> of the field, <S%H7704><s%> Assemble <S%H6908><s%> yourselves, <S%H935><s%> and come; gather <S%H622><s%> yourselves on every side <S%H5439><s%> to my sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> that I do sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> for you, <S%H1419><s%> even a great sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> on the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that you may eat <S%H398><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%> blood. <S%H1818><s%>

You shall eat <S%H398><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the mighty, <S%H1368><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the princes <S%H5387><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> of rams, <S%H352><s%> of lambs, <S%H3733><s%> and of goats, <S%H6260><s%> of bulls, <S%H6499><s%> all of them fatlings <S%H4806><s%> of Bashan. <S%H1316><s%>

You shall eat <S%H398><s%> fat <S%H2459><s%> until you be full, <S%H7654><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> until you are drunk, <S%H7943><s%> of my sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> which I have sacrificed for you. <S%H2076><s%>

You shall be filled <S%H7646><s%> at my table <S%H7979><s%> with horses <S%H5483><s%> and chariots, <S%H7393><s%> with mighty men, <S%H1368><s%> and with all men <S%H376><s%> of war, <S%H4421><s%> says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3069><s%>

I will set <S%H5414><s%> my glory <S%H3519><s%> among the nations; <S%H1471><s%> and all the nations <S%H1471><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> my judgment <S%H4941><s%> that I have executed, <S%H6213><s%> and my hand <S%H3027><s%> that I have laid on them. <S%H7760><s%>
So the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> their God, <S%H430><s%> from that day <S%H3117><s%> and forward. <S%H1973><s%>

The nations <S%H1471><s%> shall know <S%H3045><s%> that the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went into captivity <S%H1540><s%> for their iniquity; <S%H5771><s%> because they trespassed <S%H4603><s%> against me, <S%H5641><s%> and I hid my face <S%H6440><s%> from them: <S%H5414><s%> so I gave them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of their adversaries, <S%H6862><s%> and they fell <S%H5307><s%> all of them by the sword. <S%H2719><s%>
According to their uncleanness <S%H2932><s%> and according to their transgressions <S%H6588><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> I to them; <S%H5641><s%> and I hid my face from them. <S%H6440><s%>

Therefore thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H136><s%> Now will I bring back <S%H7725><s%> the captivity <S%H7622><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and have mercy <S%H7355><s%> on the whole house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and I will be jealous <S%H7065><s%> for my holy <S%H6944><s%> name. <S%H8034><s%>

They shall bear <S%H5375><s%> their shame, <S%H3639><s%> and all their trespasses <S%H4604><s%> by which they have trespassed <S%H4603><s%> against me, <S%H3427><s%> when they shall dwell securely <S%H983><s%> in their land, <S%H127><s%> and none shall make them afraid; <S%H2729><s%>

when I have brought them back <S%H7725><s%> from the peoples, <S%H5971><s%> and gathered <S%H6908><s%> them out of their enemies <S%H341><s%>' lands, <S%H776><s%> and am sanctified <S%H6942><s%> in them in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of many <S%H7227><s%> nations. <S%H1471><s%>

They shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> their God, <S%H430><s%> in that I caused them to go into captivity <S%H1540><s%> among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and have gathered <S%H3664><s%> them to their own land; <S%H127><s%> and I will leave none of them any more there; <S%H3498><s%>

neither will I hide <S%H5641><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> any more from them; <S%H8210><s%> for I have poured out my Spirit <S%H7307><s%> on the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3069><s%>
